alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Nelson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 10:48AM EST until February 06 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Rolling Fork River near Boston affecting Hardin and Nelson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO SUNDAY AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rolling Fork River near Boston. * WHEN...From late tonight to Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Agricultural bottomland is covered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 32.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late tonight to 35.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall to 35.2 feet and begin rising again tomorrow evening. It will rise to 35.5 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued Friday night.
